details.description:
Super sized 1 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
Big bedroom Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick
Perfect location, near all things that make Williamsburg, Williamsburg! JMZ and G trains nearby. Local hotspots such as L?Industrie Pizzeria, Pies ?n? Thighs, Vanessa?s Dumpling House, Banter Bar, Nighthawk Cinema, etc
Available Aug 1st Small pets accepted No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Large one bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, king sized bedroom, ample closet space, large living room and separate kitchen. Pets are welcome. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
NO BROKER FEE! Small pets OK August 1 move in

Beautiful 1 bedroom in South Williamsburg
Pre-war elevator beauty located at South 3rd and Havemeyer ? 3 minutes to the Marcy JMZ
Tons of natural light in the elevator building pre-war Southern exposure for incredible morning light in the bedroom Exposed brick Full sized stainless steel appliances Great square shaped living room ? naturally accommodates a sofa / coffee table / TV Cook?s kitchen ? two sets of windows great for growing herbs / spices indoors!
August 1st move in Heat and hot water included

Gorgeous 1.5 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat; Hot Water is included.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Available now Small pets OK No broker fee

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom(s), stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby's All Right, Patrizia's, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.
1 month free

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful Studio/ 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location! This apartment features a spacious living space, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the J, M trains.

Modern 1 Bed / 1 Bath at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 1-bedroom features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center
In-unit washer/dryer
Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!

Located on a quiet block in prime Williamsburg, this true two-bedroom offers great space and even better location. Both bedrooms have windows, closets, and comfortably fit queen beds. The layout features a separate living room and a renovated kitchen. Just a quick walk to the Bedford L and Marcy JMZ trains, and when you're ready to unwind, head upstairs to the rooftop for wide-open Manhattan views and epic sunsets over the water.

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in East Williamsburg, prime location!

You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Roberta's, Sweet Science, Honey's, Wayward Social, Syndicated, Guadalupe, Reclamation, Ichiran, Momo Sushi Shack, El Cortez.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Available September 1st
Bright and airy loft at 108 Harrison Pl #2L, featuring high ceilings, hardwood floors, and oversized windows that let in plenty of natural light. The open layout includes a modern kitchen, updated bathroom, and plenty of space to relax or entertain.
Just steps from the Morgan Ave L train ? only about 15 minutes to Manhattan. Close to parks, coffee shops, and all the creative energy that makes Bushwick unique.
Ready for a September 1st move-in ? come take a look!

No Fee ? Luxury 1 Bed / 1 Bath in Brand New Elevator Building in Clinton Hill!
Modern design meets prime location in this spacious 1-bedroom, 1 bath apartment featuring hardwood floors, high ceilings, central A/C, and a private balcony. The open layout is perfect for entertaining, and each bedroom offers great light and flexibility.
Enjoy top-notch amenities including: ? Elevator ? Gym ? Lounge; Game Room ? Shared Workspace; Public Wifi ? Laundry Room; Bike Storage ? Furnished Rooftop with Skyline Views ? Courtyard; Outdoor Spaces ? Dishwasher, Eat-In Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances
Just 1 block from the Franklin Ave C/S trains?15 minutes to Manhattan. Close to Outpost, Doris, Sisters, and other local favorites.
First; Security Only | No Fee | Pets on Approval

amenities.other: A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Intercom system, Central A/C, Roof Access, Balcony/Terrace

details.description:
Beautiful 1.5 Bedroom/ 1 bath ? 655 Bushwick Ave
Located in the heart of Bushwick, just steps from the J/M/Z trains at Myrtle Ave.
This bright and spacious apartment features:
Two queen-sized bedrooms
Stainless steel appliances
Dishwasher
Hardwood floors
Great natural light
Ample closet space
Live in one of Brooklyn?s most vibrant neighborhoods!

Bright and modern 1-bedroom in a beautifully restored historic mansion on Bushwick Ave, just one block from the J/Z trains at Gates Ave. This thoughtfully renovated home features a spacious living area with great natural light, a uniquely shaped bedroom with oversized windows and a full closet, and sleek modern finishes throughout.
Features include:
High ceilings and hardwood floors
Central air and dishwasher
Great sunlight throughout
Building perks:
Laundry on-site
Bike storage
Parking available

Virtual tours available!

Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

Discover your new home at 31-19 37th St, a place where comfort and style meet in perfect harmony. This stunning industrial-chic apartment offers three sunlit bedrooms in a building filled with modern amenities. Experience the charm of historic Astoria while enjoying conveniences such as an elevator, a laundry room, a residents' lounge, and a fully furnished rooftop with breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline. With easy access to the N/Q lines at Broadway and the R/M lines at Steinway, you'll be just 20 minutes away from Midtown.

details.description:
Luxury Apartments at 931 Carroll Street
Welcome to 931 Carroll Street, a brand-new luxury rental building in the heart of Brooklyn. Just a block from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum, and within walking distance of Prospect Park, this location offers an unbeatable blend of culture and nature. Only 2 blocks from the 2, 3, 4, 5 trains and the Shuttle to the A, C, Q trains, you're perfectly positioned for quick access across the city.
Offering studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartments, each unit boasts modern design, premium finishes, and oversized windows with stunning views.
Features include: In-unit washer/dryer Dishwasher Hardwood floors Private outdoor space (balcony, courtyard, or patio) Central air and expansive windows for natural light
Building Amenities: State-of-the-art fitness center Landscaped rooftop terrace with panoramic city views Tranquil courtyard for relaxation Garage parking, bike room, and storage options Media room, package room, and pet spa
Live in luxury, surrounded by cultural landmarks and green spaces. With excellent public transportation and nearby shopping and dining options, 931 Carroll Street is your gateway to the best of Brooklyn.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C
